Text: Though I like the software for producing Tabs, the songs I've seen covered in the tab bundles both here on TPB and elsewhere on the net are lame as hell. There is no layering, or any kind of accuracy like you'd find transcribed in a guitar magazine or Hal Leonard book, just over simplified one note runs that usually only captivates the tonality of a measure. No arpegiation, inaccurate solos, mis-timed chord progressions etc. You'd think software developers would spend more time transcribing songs, or at very least locating already accurately transcribed songs and bundling them.
